      • getSupportedPlatformNames

        public Iterable<String> getSupportedPlatformNames()
        从接口复制的说明: PlatformProvider
        Names of platforms supported by this provider. Each returned name can be used as the key for --release.
        指定者:
        getSupportedPlatformNames 在接口中 PlatformProvider
        返回:
        the platform keys

      • getPlatform

        public PlatformDescription getPlatform(String platformName,
                                       String options)
        从接口复制的说明: PlatformProvider
        Create a description of a selected platform.
        指定者:
        getPlatform 在接口中 PlatformProvider
        参数:
        platformName - the name of the selected platform
        options - additional parameter, which can be specified after ':' on the command line
        返回:
        a PlatformDescription
